name: Volkyri Aesthetic
description: Ancient starfaring warrior-attendants from the Hel Vortex system - asymmetrical half-horn, metallic bodysuits, martial elegance
templates: Volkyri {role} in {primary_metal} metallic bodysuit with {accent_color} accent panels, {horn_description}. {pose_action}, expression of {expression}. {environment}. {lighting}. {skin_hair}. {shot_composition}. {style_tag}.

{horn_description}, Volkyri {role} clad in form-fitting {primary_metal} armor with {accent_color} trim. {pose_action}. {expression} evident in her features. {environment}. {lighting} catches the metallic sheen of her attire. {skin_hair}. {shot_composition}. {style_tag}.

Volkyri {role} bearing {horn_description}. She wears {primary_metal} reflective bodysuit with {accent_color} accents, {pose_action}. Expression of {expression} as {environment}. {lighting}. {skin_hair}, horn breaking silhouette asymmetrically. {shot_composition}. {style_tag}.

Single {horn_shape} half-horn {horn_origin} of this Volkyri {role}, {horn_metal} sheathing catching light. {primary_metal} bodysuit with {accent_color} chest panel, {pose_action}. {expression} masks lethal capability. {environment}. {lighting}. {skin_hair}. {shot_composition}. {style_tag}.

Volkyri {role} presents striking asymmetry with {horn_description}. Form-fitting {primary_metal} metallic attire with {accent_color} accents covers her frame as {pose_action}. {environment}, her {expression} unwavering. {lighting}. {skin_hair}. {shot_composition}. {style_tag}.

horn_description: single half-horn growing from left temple in swept-blade shape with polished metal sheathing
single half-horn growing from right temple in swept-blade shape, chrome-sheathed bone
asymmetrical half-horn emerging from left skull, conical spire variant with gunmetal plating
single conical spire horn fused to right temple, bone ridges visible at skull fusion point
half-horn of geometric plated design growing from left temple, angular faceted segments
right-temple mounted geometric horn with crystalline metal sheathing, bone fused to skull
single flame-swept horn curving from left temple in graceful S-curve, golden metal sheath
flame-swept half-horn emerging from right skull, flowing frozen-fire shape with chrome finish
spiral-twist horn growing from left temple, elegant helical form with ceremonial metal bands
single spiral horn fused to right temple, bone structure visible beneath silver plating
curved-talon half-horn emerging from left skull, smooth predatory curve with dark metal sheath
right-temple curved-talon horn, single backward sweep like obsidian claw fused to bone
expression: cold assessment, superior gaze evaluating all before her
subtle menace, slight smile suggesting imminent danger
regal composure, neutral and dignified, utterly unreadable
fierce focus, intense concentration betraying combat readiness
glacial serenity, absolute calm that masks violence beneath
proud defiance, chin raised with unwavering resolve
cold assessment as amber eyes scan her surroundings
subtle menace despite seemingly composed bearing
regal composure befitting ancient warrior nobility
fierce focus locked on unseen threat
glacial serenity that belies lethal capability
proud defiance etched into angular features
pose_action: she stands with martial bearing, spine straight and chin level
seated on obsidian throne fragment, hands resting on armrests
one gloved hand raised in commanding gesture
kneeling with ceremonial precision, blade presented horizontally
standing at cliff edge, profile silhouette against void
captured mid-leap, body arched with athletic precision
both hands gripping ancient data-tome before her
arms crossed over metallic chest panel, weight shifted to one hip
striding forward with purposeful menace, cape of shadow trailing
holding ritual chalice of dark liquid at shoulder height
one hand on hip, other arm extended toward viewer
turning to glance over shoulder, horn silhouette prominent
environment: Within dimly lit archive chamber of black stone and metal shelving
Rocky volcanic terrain stretches behind her, ash-filled sky and distant magma glow
Industrial gothic interior with geometric shadows pooling in corners
Twilight wasteland environment with metallic aurora overhead
At cliff edge overlooking jagged obsidian peaks beneath dying suns
Geometric fortress architecture frames her, harsh angular shadows everywhere
Throne chamber of polished black marble and chrome fixtures
Petrified grove of crystalline trees reflecting her metallic form
Fortress refectory with angular black-metal furnishings
Void space backdrop, distant nebula casting colored light
Ceremonial hall with towering columns of dark metal
Obsidian shore with metallic tide pools reflecting three suns
lighting: Dramatic rim lighting from behind catches every metallic surface
Single harsh key light carves deep shadows across angular features
Purple accent gel lighting adds otherworldly atmosphere
Twilight ambience with metallic aurora painting highlights
Harsh directional light suggesting dying suns overhead
Strong underlighting creates dramatic upward shadows
Specular highlights dance across chrome and polished metal
Crimson accent lighting from molten background glow
Cool blue rim light separates figure from void darkness
Multiple stellar light sources cast overlapping warm shadows
Harsh overhead lighting with deep eye shadows
Side lighting emphasizes the asymmetry of her horn
skin_hair: Pale porcelain skin contrasts dark attire, raven hair slicked back from horn
Alabaster complexion, silver-white hair flowing opposite the horn
Pale skin with subtle blue undertones, jet black hair cropped short
Porcelain features, dark hair in severe braid along hornless side
Near-white skin, ash-gray hair swept dramatically from temple
Pallid complexion catching metallic reflections, hair like liquid shadow
Ivory skin luminous against dark armor, platinum hair in warrior knots
Ghost-pale features, obsidian hair contrasting the metallic horn sheath
Marble-white skin, steel-gray hair falling past shoulders
Deathly pale complexion, midnight blue-black hair slicked severely back

Full body shot showing complete metallic attire and stance
Close-up portrait emphasizing horn and expression
Three-quarter shot capturing pose and environmental context
Environmental wide shot with figure as focal anchor
Action shot frozen at dynamic moment

Dramatic Dutch angle adding tension to composition
